name: Chipper and Sons Lumber Co
description:
Try On GameJolt

Yes, this is the game that started it all! Come see all of the creepy characters that were never meant to be scary! ;) But seriously, a lot of people have been requesting this game, so here it is. It's not a great game, by any measure, but hopefully it provides a little fun and a few laughs! :)

This was originally a mobile app, so you will need to click arrows on the screen to move your character.
